welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Villahermosa, Colombia! Get ready to be charmed by the city's vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty of Villahermosa. Enjoy your stay!"
